naslov: Vila Istra Rovinj / Svetvinčenat 220 m2 velika okučnica bazen (rent) (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Predivna vila kompletno namještena i opremljena okružena zelenilom, uređena okućnica sa velikim bazenom (8m x 4m). Izvrsna mikrolokacija samo pet kilometara udaljenosti od Svetvinčenta (mjesto Bijažići). Plaže Fažane, Pule i Rovinja na samo 20tak minuta vožnje.Vila nudi boravak na otvorenom tokom gotovo cijele godine, ugodno inspirativno okruženje za život kao i za posao. Vila ima četiri spavaće sobe na katu od kojih jedna ima walk-in tuš/kupaonicu. Ukupno tri kupaonice plus vanjski tuš i toalet u prizemlju. Prizemlje je rezervirano za dnevno uživanje u suncu i opuštanje - veliki dnevni boravak sa kaminom povezan sa lijepom rustikalnom kuhinjom opremeljenom modernim aparatima i blagovaonicom. Izlaz na natkrivenu terasu sa vanjskom kuhinjom te pogledom na bazen i otvorene terase rezervirane za uživanje na suncu. Odvojena praonica rublja. Za one najsmjelije vila može postati oaza uspješnog posla i odmora , ono čemu svi mi težimo a možda se nismo usudili probati. Udaljenost sadržaja: Glavani Park 14 km • Safari Park, Brijuni 18 km • Adventure Park Jangalooz - AC Bi-Village Fažana 19 km Mini Trgovina 3,1 km • Supermarket 5,3 km • Pekara 14 km • Shopping centar 25 km Cijena mjesečnog najma 3200€. Vila se iznajmljuje dugororčno. Energetski certifikat B. Slobodno se javite za sve dodatne informacije i razgledavnje vile. Mirjana Orešković Doors agencija + 385 91 25 777 07 Beautiful villa fully furnished and equipped surrounded by greenery, landscaped garden with a large swimming pool (8m x 4m). Excellent micro-location only five kilometers away from Svetvinčenat (town of Bijažići). The beaches of Fažana, Pula and Rovinj are only a 20-minute drive away. The villa offers an outdoor stay almost all year round, a pleasant, inspiring environment for living as well as for work. The villa has four bedrooms upstairs, one of which has a walk-in shower/bathroom. A total of three bathrooms plus an outdoor shower and toilet on the ground floor. The ground floor is reserved for daily sun enjoyment and relaxation - a large living room with a fireplace connected to a nice rustic kitchen equipped with modern appliances and a dining area. Access to a covered terrace with an outdoor kitchen and a view of the pool and open terraces reserved for enjoying the sun. Separate laundry room. For the most daring, the villa can become an oasis of successful work and vacation, something that we all strive for and perhaps did not dare to try. Distance of contents: Glavani Park 14 km • Safari Park, Brijuni 18 km • Adventure Park Jangalooz - AC Bi-Village Fažana 19 km Mini Shop 3.1 km • Supermarket 5.3 km • Bakery 14 km • Shopping center 25 km Monthly rental price 3200€. The villa is rented for a long time. Energy Performance Certificate B. Feel free to contact us for any additional information and sightseeing of the villa. Mirjana Orešković Doors agency + 385 91 25 777 07
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
